name: Async
description: Utility for widgets that work with both synchronous and asynchronous values.

use: a value might be immediate or future-based.
you want to avoid writing separate sync/async widget paths.

examples.minimal:
FutureOrBuilder<String>(
  future: maybeFutureTitle,
  builder: (context, snapshot) => Text(snapshot.data ?? '...'),
)

theming: No theme hooks; style within the `builder`.
accessibility: Ensure loading states are announced or visually distinct.
dont: Perform expensive work directly in the builder.
